name: m365-meeting-list-invitees-rsvp
title: List upcoming meeting with list of invitees along with RSVP Status
shortDescription: Ask Copilot to list the upcoming meetings with the list of invitees and their RSVP status
longDescription: This prompt will ask Copilot to list the upcoming meetings with the list of invitees and their RSVP status. This will help you to list the meeting details along with the invitees, my RSVP status. If there are any conflicts in the meeting schedule, it will show the details in the bold text.

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot for Microsoft 365 to list upcoming meeting with list of invitees along with RSVP Status
